
            <h1 class="postTitle">
                <a id="cb_post_title_url" class="postTitle2 vertical-middle" href="https://www.cnblogs.com/CareySon/p/18801509" title="发布于 2025-03-31 08:55">
    <span role="heading" aria-level="2">为什么构造函数需要尽可能的简单</span>
    

</a>

            </h1>
            <div class="clear"></div>
            <div class="postBody">
                <div id="cnblogs_post_body" class="blogpost-body blogpost-body-html">
<article class="4ever-article" data-clipboard-cangjie="[&quot;root&quot;,{},[&quot;p&quot;,{&quot;ind&quot;:{&quot;firstLine&quot;:32},&quot;uuid&quot;:&quot;m8rgl34vibk7te2qjd&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;text&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;leaf&quot;},&quot;最近在做一些代码重构，涉及到Python中部分代码重构后，单元测试实现较为麻烦甚至难以实现的场景，其中一个主要的原因是构造函数过于复杂。&quot;]]],[&quot;p&quot;,{&quot;ind&quot;:{&quot;firstLine&quot;:32},&quot;uuid&quot;:&quot;m8rgpmd7jse3062zz8&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;text&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;leaf&quot;},&quot;因此，本篇文章借此总结一下我们应该需要什么样的构造函数。本篇文章涉及的概念不仅限于Python。&quot;]]],[&quot;p&quot;,{&quot;ind&quot;:{},&quot;uuid&quot;:&quot;m8rgqk7mbj6gfpb2fh6&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;text&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;leaf&quot;},&quot;&quot;]]],[&quot;h1&quot;,{&quot;ind&quot;:{},&quot;uuid&quot;:&quot;m8rgrx6iu4sjbrr4ukq&quot;,&quot;spacing&quot;:{&quot;before&quot;:26.666666666666664,&quot;after&quot;:9,&quot;line&quot;:0.8529411764705882}},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;text&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;bold&quot;:true,&quot;sz&quot;:20,&quot;szUnit&quot;:&quot;pt&quot;,&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;leaf&quot;},&quot;构造函数是什么&quot;]]],[&quot;p&quot;,{&quot;ind&quot;:{&quot;firstLine&quot;:32},&quot;uuid&quot;:&quot;m8rgs11nwolr8djfsob&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;text&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;leaf&quot;},&quot;构造函数用于创建对象时触发，如果不自定义构造函数，通常现代的编程语言在编译时会自动加一个无参的构造函数，同时将类成员设置成默认值，Python中需要定义对象成员才能访问，而类C语言比如C#中int、bool、float等都会设置为0等值的值，比如整数为0、浮点数为0.0或布尔值为false，对于非原始值的引用类型，比如String或Class，都会设置为Null。&quot;]]],[&quot;p&quot;,{&quot;ind&quot;:{&quot;firstLine&quot;:32},&quot;uuid&quot;:&quot;m8rh4gik12tnimdti7j&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;text&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;leaf&quot;},&quot;构造函数是对类初始化非常合理的位置。因为构造函数是新建对象时触发，相比对象构造之后再去修改对象属性，带来的麻烦远比收益多，比如说空指针、时序耦合、多线程问题等，这些有兴趣后续有机会再聊，但总之将类的初始化放到构造函数中就像是先打地基再盖房子，而不是房子盖一半再回头修补地基，也避免类处于“半成品”状态。&quot;]]],[&quot;p&quot;,{&quot;ind&quot;:{&quot;firstLine&quot;:32},&quot;uuid&quot;:&quot;m8rgqkuvzr8c622ks28&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;text&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;leaf&quot;},&quot;虽然构造函数应该做完整的工作避免半成品，但如果给构造函数赋予太多的责任，会对系统带来很多麻烦，就好比房子主体结构（构造函数）还没完工，就要搬家具进房屋，通常会带来不必要的负担。&quot;]]],[&quot;p&quot;,{&quot;ind&quot;:{},&quot;uuid&quot;:&quot;m8rhhcvdrom6tghm6xb&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;text&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;leaf&quot;},&quot;&quot;]]],[&quot;h1&quot;,{&quot;ind&quot;:{},&quot;uuid&quot;:&quot;m8rhhdgzdog37wdl8ah&quot;,&quot;spacing&quot;:{&quot;before&quot;:26.666666666666664,&quot;after&quot;:9,&quot;line&quot;:0.8529411764705882}},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;text&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;bold&quot;:true,&quot;sz&quot;:20,&quot;szUnit&quot;:&quot;pt&quot;,&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;leaf&quot;},&quot;我们需要什么样的构造函数&quot;]]],[&quot;p&quot;,{&quot;ind&quot;:{&quot;firstLine&quot;:32},&quot;uuid&quot;:&quot;m8rhi0lrlbirwoifeon&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;text&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;leaf&quot;},&quot;一句话总结：在我看来，构造函数只应该做赋值，以及最基本的参数校验。而不应该做外部调用和复杂的初始化，使用简单构造函数能够带来如下好处：&quot;]]],[&quot;p&quot;,{&quot;ind&quot;:{},&quot;uuid&quot;:&quot;m8rhjifi1r3k3g9km7l&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;text&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;leaf&quot;},&quot;&quot;]]],[&quot;h2&quot;,{&quot;ind&quot;:{},&quot;uuid&quot;:&quot;m8rhksniwl76e2dgmf&quot;,&quot;spacing&quot;:{&quot;before&quot;:21.333333333333332,&quot;after&quot;:9,&quot;line&quot;:0.8529411764705882}},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;text&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;bold&quot;:true,&quot;sz&quot;:16,&quot;szUnit&quot;:&quot;pt&quot;,&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;leaf&quot;},&quot;可维护性&quot;]]],[&quot;h3&quot;,{&quot;uuid&quot;:&quot;m8s6fnbh8m87x54tkdv&quot;,&quot;spacing&quot;:{&quot;before&quot;:18.666666666666664,&quot;after&quot;:8,&quot;line&quot;:0.8529411764705882}},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;text&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;bold&quot;:true,&quot;sz&quot;:14,&quot;szUnit&quot;:&quot;pt&quot;,&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;leaf&quot;},&quot;单一职责，避免惊喜&quot;]]],[&quot;p&quot;,{&quot;uuid&quot;:&quot;m8s6gf52fa5fi7it2df&quot;,&quot;ind&quot;:{&quot;firstLine&quot;:32}},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;text&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;leaf&quot;},&quot;构造函数也应当遵循单一职责原则，仅负责对象的初始化和基本验证，而不应包含其他复杂操作。当构造函数承担过多责任时，会产生意外的\&quot;惊喜\&quot;，使代码难以理解和维护。&quot;]]],[&quot;p&quot;,{&quot;uuid&quot;:&quot;m8s6ln8mtax5pol2oqg&quot;,&quot;ind&quot;:{&quot;firstLine&quot;:32}},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;text&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;leaf&quot;},&quot;例如下面代码，在构造函数中执行了数据库查询操作（外部依赖），以及统计计算（无外部依赖，复杂的内部计算），我们很难一眼看出该函数初始化要做什么，增加阅读和理解代码的认知负担。&quot;]]],[&quot;code&quot;,{&quot;syntax&quot;:&quot;python&quot;,&quot;theme&quot;:&quot;default&quot;,&quot;wrap&quot;:true,&quot;id&quot;:&quot;2zwddn&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;fold&quot;:false,&quot;hideHeader&quot;:false,&quot;codeFolding&quot;:false,&quot;showLineNumber&quot;:true,&quot;font&quot;:{&quot;fontFamily&quot;:&quot;defaultFont&quot;,&quot;ligatures&quot;:false},&quot;enableMacHeader&quot;:false,&quot;uuid&quot;:&quot;m8s6l2n3p8ctdvaufr&quot;,&quot;code&quot;:&quot;class UserReport:\n    def __init__(self, user_id):\n        self.user_id = user_id\n        # 构造函数中进行数据库操作（有外部依赖）\n        self.user = database.fetch_user(user_id)\n        # 构造函数中执行复杂计算（内部复杂计算，无外部依赖）\n        self.statistics = self._calculate_statistics()\n    \n    def _calculate_statistics(self):\n        # 假设是一个复杂的统计计算\n        return {\&quot;login_count\&quot;: 42, \&quot;active_days\&quot;: 15}&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;text&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;leaf&quot;},&quot;class UserReport:\n    def __init__(self, user_id):\n        self.user_id = user_id\n        # 构造函数中进行数据库操作（有外部依赖）\n        self.user = database.fetch_user(user_id)\n        # 构造函数中执行复杂计算（内部复杂计算，无外部依赖）\n        self.statistics = self._calculate_statistics()\n    \n    def _calculate_statistics(self):\n        # 假设是一个复杂的统计计算\n        return {\&quot;login_count\&quot;: 42, \&quot;active_days\&quot;: 15}&quot;]]],[&quot;p&quot;,{&quot;uuid&quot;:&quot;m8s6gv9iqo2cfa80er&quot;,&quot;ind&quot;:{&quot;firstLine&quot;:32}},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;text&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;leaf&quot;},&quot;而理想的构造函数，应该只是简单做“初始化赋值”这一个操作，如下所示：&quot;]]],[&quot;code&quot;,{&quot;syntax&quot;:&quot;python&quot;,&quot;theme&quot;:&quot;default&quot;,&quot;wrap&quot;:true,&quot;id&quot;:&quot;q9pdqd&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;fold&quot;:false,&quot;hideHeader&quot;:false,&quot;codeFolding&quot;:false,&quot;showLineNumber&quot;:true,&quot;font&quot;:{&quot;fontFamily&quot;:&quot;defaultFont&quot;,&quot;ligatures&quot;:false},&quot;enableMacHeader&quot;:false,&quot;uuid&quot;:&quot;m8s6uv0jnqg6dy0mqir&quot;,&quot;code&quot;:&quot;class UserReport:\n    def __init__(self, user, statistics):\n        \&quot;\&quot;\&quot;构造函数只负责初始化，不执行其他操作\&quot;\&quot;\&quot;\n        self.user = user\n        self.statistics = statistics&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;text&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;leaf&quot;},&quot;class UserReport:\n    def __init__(self, user, statistics):\n        \&quot;\&quot;\&quot;构造函数只负责初始化，不执行其他操作\&quot;\&quot;\&quot;\n        self.user = user\n        self.statistics = statistics&quot;]]],[&quot;p&quot;,{&quot;uuid&quot;:&quot;m8s6uje4x9o8qi9pa1&quot;,&quot;ind&quot;:{&quot;firstLine&quot;:32}},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;text&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;leaf&quot;},&quot;该构造函数只做初始化赋值，没有预期之外的情况，比如例子中_calculate_statistics函数，如果在方法内继续引用其他类，其他类再次有外部依赖的访问（比如IO、API调用、数据库操作等），会产生惊喜。&quot;]]],[&quot;p&quot;,{&quot;uuid&quot;:&quot;m8s6xujt2o4u0xd0jnq&quot;,&quot;ind&quot;:{&quot;firstLine&quot;:32}},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;text&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;leaf&quot;},&quot;&quot;]]],[&quot;h3&quot;,{&quot;ind&quot;:{},&quot;uuid&quot;:&quot;m8rhmak20e75x4p3aa8&quot;,&quot;spacing&quot;:{&quot;before&quot;:18.666666666666664,&quot;after&quot;:8,&quot;line&quot;:0.8529411764705882}},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;text&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;bold&quot;:true,&quot;sz&quot;:14,&quot;szUnit&quot;:&quot;pt&quot;,&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;leaf&quot;},&quot;减少意外的副作用&quot;]]],[&quot;p&quot;,{&quot;uuid&quot;:&quot;m8s78iwse42bk3sivg&quot;,&quot;ind&quot;:{&quot;firstLine&quot;:32}},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;text&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;leaf&quot;},&quot;构造函数中包含复杂操作不仅违反单一职责原则，还可能带来意外的副作用。这些副作用可能导致系统行为不可预测，增加调试难度，甚至引发难以察觉的bug。&quot;]]],[&quot;p&quot;,{&quot;uuid&quot;:&quot;m8s78rmesfieqkenqgc&quot;,&quot;ind&quot;:{&quot;firstLine&quot;:32}},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;text&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;leaf&quot;},&quot;我们继续看之前的代码示例：&quot;]]],[&quot;code&quot;,{&quot;syntax&quot;:&quot;python&quot;,&quot;theme&quot;:&quot;default&quot;,&quot;wrap&quot;:true,&quot;id&quot;:&quot;4umvbi&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;fold&quot;:false,&quot;hideHeader&quot;:false,&quot;codeFolding&quot;:false,&quot;showLineNumber&quot;:true,&quot;font&quot;:{&quot;fontFamily&quot;:&quot;defaultFont&quot;,&quot;ligatures&quot;:false},&quot;enableMacHeader&quot;:false,&quot;uuid&quot;:&quot;m8s798ohm51xmlyeohi&quot;,&quot;code&quot;:&quot;class UserReport:\n    def __init__(self, user_id):\n        self.user_id = user_id\n        # 构造函数中进行数据库操作\n        self.user = database.fetch_user(user_id)\n        # 构造函数中执行复杂计算\n        self.statistics = self._calculate_statistics()\n    \n    def _calculate_statistics(self):\n        # 复杂的统计计算\n        data = database.fetch_user_activities(self.user_id)\n        if not data:\n            # 可能抛出异常\n            raise ValueError(f\&quot;No activity data for user {self.user_id}\&quot;)\n        return {\&quot;login_count\&quot;: len(data), \&quot;active_days\&quot;: len(set(d.date() for d in data))}&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;text&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;leaf&quot;},&quot;class UserReport:\n    def __init__(self, user_id):\n        self.user_id = user_id\n        # 构造函数中进行数据库操作\n        self.user = database.fetch_user(user_id)\n        # 构造函数中执行复杂计算\n        self.statistics = self._calculate_statistics()\n    \n    def _calculate_statistics(self):\n        # 复杂的统计计算\n        data = database.fetch_user_activities(self.user_id)\n        if not data:\n            # 可能抛出异常\n            raise ValueError(f\&quot;No activity data for user {self.user_id}\&quot;)\n        return {\&quot;login_count\&quot;: len(data), \&quot;active_days\&quot;: len(set(d.date() for d in data))}&quot;]]],[&quot;p&quot;,{&quot;uuid&quot;:&quot;m8s796pk1y69n0yxgef&quot;,&quot;ind&quot;:{&quot;firstLine&quot;:32}},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;text&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;leaf&quot;},&quot;这段代码可以看到，_calculate_statistics() 函数有数据库访问，这是隐藏的依赖，同时如果数据库访问存在异常可能导致整个对象创建失败，调用者只想创建对象，却可能引发了数据库无法连接的异常。这在运行时都属于意外。&quot;]]],[&quot;code&quot;,{&quot;syntax&quot;:&quot;python&quot;,&quot;theme&quot;:&quot;default&quot;,&quot;wrap&quot;:true,&quot;id&quot;:&quot;vb9ngq&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;fold&quot;:false,&quot;hideHeader&quot;:false,&quot;codeFolding&quot;:false,&quot;showLineNumber&quot;:true,&quot;font&quot;:{&quot;fontFamily&quot;:&quot;defaultFont&quot;,&quot;ligatures&quot;:false},&quot;enableMacHeader&quot;:false,&quot;uuid&quot;:&quot;m8s7xp7kj3iml0ck47s&quot;,&quot;code&quot;:&quot;Traceback (most recent call last):\n  File \&quot;main.py\&quot;, line 42, in <module>\n    report = UserReport(user_id=1001)  # 调用者只是想创建一个报告对象\n  File \&quot;user_report.py\&quot;, line 5, in __init__\n    self.user = database.fetch_user(user_id)  # 数据库查询可能失败\n  File \&quot;database.py\&quot;, line 78, in fetch_user\n    user_data = self._execute_query(f\&quot;SELECT * FROM users WHERE id = {user_id}\&quot;)\n  File \&quot;database.py\&quot;, line 31, in _execute_query\n    connection = self._get_connection()\n  File \&quot;database.py\&quot;, line 15, in _get_connection\n    return pymysql.connect(host=self.host, user=self.user, password=self.password, db=self.db_name)\n  File \&quot;/usr/local/lib/python3.8/site-packages/pymysql/__init__.py\&quot;, line 94, in Connect\n    return Connection(*args, **kwargs)\n  File \&quot;/usr/local/lib/python3.8/site-packages/pymysql/connections.py\&quot;, line 327, in __init__\n    self.connect()\n  File \&quot;/usr/local/lib/python3.8/site-packages/pymysql/connections.py\&quot;, line 629, in connect\n    raise exc\npymysql.err.OperationalError: (2003, \&quot;Can't connect to MySQL server on 'db.example.com' (timed out)\&quot;)&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;text&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;leaf&quot;},&quot;Traceback (most recent call last):\n  File \&quot;main.py\&quot;, line 42, in <module>\n    report = UserReport(user_id=1001)  # 调用者只是想创建一个报告对象\n  File \&quot;user_report.py\&quot;, line 5, in __init__\n    self.user = database.fetch_user(user_id)  # 数据库查询可能失败\n  File \&quot;database.py\&quot;, line 78, in fetch_user\n    user_data = self._execute_query(f\&quot;SELECT * FROM users WHERE id = {user_id}\&quot;)\n  File \&quot;database.py\&quot;, line 31, in _execute_query\n    connection = self._get_connection()\n  File \&quot;database.py\&quot;, line 15, in _get_connection\n    return pymysql.connect(host=self.host, user=self.user, password=self.password, db=self.db_name)\n  File \&quot;/usr/local/lib/python3.8/site-packages/pymysql/__init__.py\&quot;, line 94, in Connect\n    return Connection(*args, **kwargs)\n  File \&quot;/usr/local/lib/python3.8/site-packages/pymysql/connections.py\&quot;, line 327, in __init__\n    self.connect()\n  File \&quot;/usr/local/lib/python3.8/site-packages/pymysql/connections.py\&quot;, line 629, in connect\n    raise exc\npymysql.err.OperationalError: (2003, \&quot;Can't connect to MySQL server on 'db.example.com' (timed out)\&quot;)&quot;]]],[&quot;p&quot;,{&quot;uuid&quot;:&quot;m8s7xnhip38ukw1k0oo&quot;,&quot;ind&quot;:{}},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;text&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;leaf&quot;},&quot;而将计算逻辑提取到专门函数，访问外部依赖的逻辑通过注入进行，就不会存在该问题：&quot;]]],[&quot;code&quot;,{&quot;syntax&quot;:&quot;python&quot;,&quot;theme&quot;:&quot;default&quot;,&quot;wrap&quot;:true,&quot;id&quot;:&quot;m6a0bo&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;fold&quot;:false,&quot;hideHeader&quot;:false,&quot;codeFolding&quot;:false,&quot;showLineNumber&quot;:true,&quot;font&quot;:{&quot;fontFamily&quot;:&quot;defaultFont&quot;,&quot;ligatures&quot;:false},&quot;enableMacHeader&quot;:false,&quot;uuid&quot;:&quot;m8s81eef3y3wmjgkcnm&quot;,&quot;code&quot;:&quot;class UserReport:\n    def __init__(self, user, statistics=None):\n        \&quot;\&quot;\&quot;构造函数只负责初始化，无副作用\&quot;\&quot;\&quot;\n        self.user = user\n        self.statistics = statistics if statistics is not None else {}\n    \n    def calculate_statistics(self, activity_source):\n        \&quot;\&quot;\&quot;将计算逻辑分离到专门的方法，并接受依赖注入\&quot;\&quot;\&quot;\n        activities = activity_source.get_activities(self.user.id)\n        self.statistics = {\n            \&quot;login_count\&quot;: len(activities),\n            \&quot;active_days\&quot;: len(set(a.date for a in activities))\n        }\n        return self.statistics\n\nclass UserActivity:\n    def __init__(self, user_id, date, action):\n        self.user_id = user_id\n        self.date = date\n        self.action = action\n\nclass DatabaseActivity:\n    def get_activities(self, user_id):\n        # 实际应用中会查询数据库\n        return database.fetch_user_activities(user_id)&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;text&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;leaf&quot;},&quot;class UserReport:\n    def __init__(self, user, statistics=None):\n        \&quot;\&quot;\&quot;构造函数只负责初始化，无副作用\&quot;\&quot;\&quot;\n        self.user = user\n        self.statistics = statistics if statistics is not None else {}\n    \n    def calculate_statistics(self, activity_source):\n        \&quot;\&quot;\&quot;将计算逻辑分离到专门的方法，并接受依赖注入\&quot;\&quot;\&quot;\n        activities = activity_source.get_activities(self.user.id)\n        self.statistics = {\n            \&quot;login_count\&quot;: len(activities),\n            \&quot;active_days\&quot;: len(set(a.date for a in activities))\n        }\n        return self.statistics\n\nclass UserActivity:\n    def __init__(self, user_id, date, action):\n        self.user_id = user_id\n        self.date = date\n        self.action = action\n\nclass DatabaseActivity:\n    def get_activities(self, user_id):\n        # 实际应用中会查询数据库\n        return database.fetch_user_activities(user_id)&quot;]]],[&quot;p&quot;,{&quot;uuid&quot;:&quot;m8s88a1kfn4g86cn49&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;text&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;leaf&quot;},&quot;&quot;]]],[&quot;h3&quot;,{&quot;ind&quot;:{},&quot;uuid&quot;:&quot;m8rhmg694l3wztwylnb&quot;,&quot;spacing&quot;:{&quot;before&quot;:18.666666666666664,&quot;after&quot;:8,&quot;line&quot;:0.8529411764705882}},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;text&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;bold&quot;:true,&quot;sz&quot;:14,&quot;szUnit&quot;:&quot;pt&quot;,&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;leaf&quot;},&quot;方便调试和演进&quot;]]],[&quot;p&quot;,{&quot;uuid&quot;:&quot;m8s84rfxl3an6r5k5ee&quot;,&quot;ind&quot;:{&quot;firstLine&quot;:32}},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;text&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;leaf&quot;},&quot;构造函数仅负责简单的初始化时，代码变得更加易于调试和演进。相比之下，包含复杂逻辑的构造函数会使问题定位和系统扩展变得困难。比如下面例子&quot;]]],[&quot;code&quot;,{&quot;syntax&quot;:&quot;python&quot;,&quot;theme&quot;:&quot;default&quot;,&quot;wrap&quot;:true,&quot;id&quot;:&quot;ogt9ug&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;fold&quot;:false,&quot;hideHeader&quot;:false,&quot;codeFolding&quot;:false,&quot;showLineNumber&quot;:true,&quot;font&quot;:{&quot;fontFamily&quot;:&quot;defaultFont&quot;,&quot;ligatures&quot;:false},&quot;enableMacHeader&quot;:false,&quot;uuid&quot;:&quot;m8s85i2jptdlitwg29&quot;,&quot;code&quot;:&quot;class UserReport:\n    def __init__(self, user_id):\n        self.user_id = user_id\n        self.user = database.fetch_user(user_id)\n        self.activities = database.fetch_user_activities(user_id)\n        self.statistics = self._calculate_statistics()\n        self.recommendations = self._generate_recommendations()\n        # 更多复杂逻辑...&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;text&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;leaf&quot;},&quot;class UserReport:\n    def __init__(self, user_id):\n        self.user_id = user_id\n        self.user = database.fetch_user(user_id)\n        self.activities = database.fetch_user_activities(user_id)\n        self.statistics = self._calculate_statistics()\n        self.recommendations = self._generate_recommendations()\n        # 更多复杂逻辑...&quot;]]],[&quot;p&quot;,{&quot;uuid&quot;:&quot;m8s85g8lbmcvyrmke9w&quot;,&quot;ind&quot;:{&quot;firstLine&quot;:32}},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;text&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;leaf&quot;},&quot;可以看到构造函数包括了太多可能失败的点，调试时也不容易找到具体哪一行除了问题。而下面方式调试容易很多：&quot;]]],[&quot;code&quot;,{&quot;syntax&quot;:&quot;python&quot;,&quot;theme&quot;:&quot;default&quot;,&quot;wrap&quot;:true,&quot;id&quot;:&quot;2fasur&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;fold&quot;:false,&quot;hideHeader&quot;:false,&quot;codeFolding&quot;:false,&quot;showLineNumber&quot;:true,&quot;font&quot;:{&quot;fontFamily&quot;:&quot;defaultFont&quot;,&quot;ligatures&quot;:false},&quot;enableMacHeader&quot;:false,&quot;uuid&quot;:&quot;m8s880n93rke98mjkyo&quot;,&quot;code&quot;:&quot;class UserReport:\n    def __init__(self, user, activities=None, statistics=None, recommendations=None):\n        self.user = user\n        self.activities = activities or []\n        self.statistics = statistics or {}\n        self.recommendations = recommendations or []&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;text&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;leaf&quot;},&quot;class UserReport:\n    def __init__(self, user, activities=None, recommendations or []&quot;]]],[&quot;p&quot;,{&quot;uuid&quot;:&quot;m8s87ys9yud6uesw4mf&quot;,&quot;ind&quot;:{&quot;firstLine&quot;:32}},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;text&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;leaf&quot;},&quot;而演进时，复杂的构造函数有很大风险，例如：&quot;]]],[&quot;code&quot;,{&quot;syntax&quot;:&quot;python&quot;,&quot;theme&quot;:&quot;default&quot;,&quot;wrap&quot;:true,&quot;id&quot;:&quot;gctvxf&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;fold&quot;:false,&quot;hideHeader&quot;:false,&quot;codeFolding&quot;:false,&quot;showLineNumber&quot;:true,&quot;font&quot;:{&quot;fontFamily&quot;:&quot;defaultFont&quot;,&quot;ligatures&quot;:false},&quot;enableMacHeader&quot;:false,&quot;uuid&quot;:&quot;m8s89mzk28gcd4dypum&quot;,&quot;code&quot;:&quot;# 需要修改原有构造函数，风险很高\nclass UserReport:\n    def __init__(self, user_id, month=None):  # 添加新参数\n        self.user_id = user_id\n        self.user = database.fetch_user(user_id)\n        # 修改现有逻辑\n        if month:\n            self.activities = database.fetch_user_activities_by_month(user_id, month)\n        else:\n            self.activities = database.fetch_user_activities(user_id)\n        # UserReport:\n    def __init__(self, user_id, month=None):  # 添加新参数\n        self.user_id = user_id\n        self.user = database.fetch_user(user_id)\n        # 修改现有逻辑\n        if month:\n            self.activities = database.fetch_user_activities_by_month(user_id, month)\n        else:\n            self.activities = database.fetch_user_activities(user_id)\n        # 以下计算可能需要调整\n        self.statistics = self._calculate_statistics()\n        self.recommendations = self._generate_recommendations()&quot;]]],[&quot;p&quot;,{&quot;uuid&quot;:&quot;m8s89l9jw16bx6zdi2&quot;,&quot;ind&quot;:{&quot;firstLine&quot;:32}},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;text&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;leaf&quot;},&quot;我们需要添加按月筛选活动数据，增加一个参数，这种情况也是实际代码维护中经常出现的，想到哪写到哪，导致构造函数变的非常复杂难以理解，同时增加出错可能性，而更好的方式如下：&quot;]]],[&quot;code&quot;,{&quot;syntax&quot;:&quot;python&quot;,&quot;theme&quot;:&quot;default&quot;,&quot;wrap&quot;:true,&quot;id&quot;:&quot;kb3ezh&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;fold&quot;:false,&quot;hideHeader&quot;:false,&quot;codeFolding&quot;:false,&quot;showLineNumber&quot;:true,&quot;font&quot;:{&quot;fontFamily&quot;:&quot;defaultFont&quot;,&quot;ligatures&quot;:false},&quot;enableMacHeader&quot;:false,&quot;uuid&quot;:&quot;m8s8bzt8mwzfikn6iyq&quot;,&quot;code&quot;:&quot;class UserReport:\n    def __init__(self, user, activities=None, statistics=None, recommendations=None):\n        self.user = user\n        self.activities = activities or []\n        self.statistics = statistics or {}\n        self.recommendations = recommendations or []\n        \n    def filter_by_month(self, month):\n        \&quot;\&quot;\&quot;添加新功能作为单独的方法\&quot;\&quot;\&quot;\n        filtered_activities = [a for a in self.activities if a.date.month == month]\n        return UserReport(\n            self.user,\n            activities=filtered_activities,\n            # 可根据需要重新计算或保留原有数据\n        )&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;text&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;leaf&quot;},&quot;class UserReport:\n    def __init__(self, user, activities=None, statistics=None, recommendations=None):\n        self.user = user\n        self.activities = activities or []\n        self.statistics = statistics or {}\n        self.recommendations = recommendations or []\n        \n    def filter_by_month(self, month):\n        \&quot;\&quot;\&quot;添加新功能作为单独的方法\&quot;\&quot;\&quot;\n        filtered_activities = [a for a in self.activities if a.date.month == month]\n        return UserReport(\n            self.user,\n            activities=filtered_activities,\n            # 可根据需要重新计算或保留原有数据\n        )&quot;]]],[&quot;p&quot;,{&quot;uuid&quot;:&quot;m8s8bs5oe0rxbyt1js9&quot;,&quot;ind&quot;:{&quot;firstLine&quot;:32}},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;text&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;leaf&quot;},&quot;新功能可以独立添加，不影响现有功能，同时也避免修改这种核心逻辑时测试不全面带来的上线提心吊胆。&quot;]]],[&quot;p&quot;,{&quot;uuid&quot;:&quot;m8s82ajjaclp30vpw5&quot;,&quot;ind&quot;:{&quot;firstLine&quot;:32}},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;text&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;leaf&quot;},&quot;&quot;]]],[&quot;h2&quot;,{&quot;ind&quot;:{},&quot;uuid&quot;:&quot;m8rhlox699ej7aa04f&quot;,&quot;spacing&quot;:{&quot;before&quot;:21.333333333333332,&quot;after&quot;:9,&quot;line&quot;:0.8529411764705882}},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;text&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;bold&quot;:true,&quot;sz&quot;:16,&quot;szUnit&quot;:&quot;pt&quot;,&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;leaf&quot;},&quot;可测试性&quot;]]],[&quot;p&quot;,{&quot;uuid&quot;:&quot;m8s8fu8d79usf2b04y&quot;,&quot;ind&quot;:{&quot;firstLine&quot;:32}},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;text&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;leaf&quot;},&quot;良好的构造函数设计对代码的可测试性有着决定性的影响。当构造函数简单且只负责基本初始化时，测试变得更加容易、更加可靠，且不依赖于特定环境。这也是为什么我写本篇文章的原因，就是在写单元测试时发现很多类几乎不可测试（部分引用的第三方类库中的类，类本身属于其他组件，我无权修改，-.-）。&quot;]]],[&quot;h3&quot;,{&quot;uuid&quot;:&quot;m8s8fu8ebyp3iwyvybb&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;text&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;leaf&quot;},&quot;依赖注入与可测试性&quot;]]],[&quot;p&quot;,{&quot;uuid&quot;:&quot;m8s8fu8eia2b3avzft&quot;,&quot;ind&quot;:{&quot;firstLine&quot;:32}},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;text&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;leaf&quot;},&quot;如果构造函数有较多逻辑，例如：&quot;]]],[&quot;code&quot;,{&quot;syntax&quot;:&quot;python&quot;,&quot;theme&quot;:&quot;default&quot;,&quot;wrap&quot;:true,&quot;id&quot;:&quot;pi9yqg&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;fold&quot;:false,&quot;hideHeader&quot;:false,&quot;codeFolding&quot;:false,&quot;showLineNumber&quot;:true,&quot;font&quot;:{&quot;fontFamily&quot;:&quot;defaultFont&quot;,&quot;ligatures&quot;:false},&quot;enableMacHeader&quot;:false,&quot;uuid&quot;:&quot;m8s8gljzydw22ks4iya&quot;,&quot;code&quot;:&quot;class UserReport:\n    def __init__(self, user_id):\n        self.user_id = user_id\n        self.user = database.fetch_user(user_id)\n        self.activities = database.fetch_user_activities(user_id)\n        self.statistics = self._calculate_statistics()&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;text&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;leaf&quot;},&quot;class UserReport:\n    def __init__(self, user_id):\n        self.user_id = user_id\n        self.user = database.fetch_user(user_id)\n        self.activities = database.fetch_user_activities(user_id)\n        self.statistics =
