test_user_report():\n    # 需要大量的模拟设置\n    with patch('module.database.fetch_user') as mock_fetch_user:\n        with patch('module.database.fetch_user_activities') as mock_fetch_activities:\n            # 配置模拟返回值\n            mock_fetch_user.return_value = User(1, \&quot;Test User\&quot;, \&quot;test@example.com\&quot;)\n            mock_fetch_activities.return_value = [\n                Activity(1, datetime(2023, 1, 1), \&quot;login\&quot;),\n                Activity(1, datetime(2023, 1, 2), \&quot;login\&quot;)\n            ]\n            \n            # 创建对象 - 即使只是测试一小部分功能也需要模拟所有依赖\n            report = UserReport(1)\n            \n            # 验证结果\n            assert report.statistics[\&quot;login_count\&quot;] == 2\n            assert report.statistics[\&quot;active_days\&quot;] == 2\n            \n            # 验证调用\n            mock_fetch_user.assert_called_once_with(1)\n            mock_fetch_activities.assert_called_once_with(1)&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;text&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;leaf&quot;},&quot;def test_user_report():\n    # 需要大量的模拟设置\n    with patch('module.database.fetch_user') as mock_fetch_user:\n        with patch('module.database.fetch_user_activities') as mock_fetch_activities:\n            # 配置模拟返回值\n            mock_fetch_user.return_value = User(1, \&quot;Test User\&quot;, \&quot;test@example.com\&quot;)\n            mock_fetch_activities.return_value = [\n                Activity(1, datetime(2023, 1, 1), \&quot;login\&quot;),\n                Activity(1, datetime(2023, 1, 2), \&quot;login\&quot;)\n            ]\n            \n            # 创建对象 - 即使只是测试一小部分功能也需要模拟所有依赖\n            report = UserReport(1)\n            \n            # 验证结果\n            assert report.statistics[\&quot;login_count\&quot;] == 2\n            assert report.statistics[\&quot;active_days\&quot;] == 2\n            \n            # 验证调用\n            mock_fetch_user.assert_called_once_with(1)\n            mock_fetch_activities.assert_called_once_with(1)&quot;]]],[&quot;p&quot;,{&quot;uuid&quot;:&quot;m8s8i7mt6rz36vrsxha&quot;,&quot;ind&quot;:{&quot;firstLine&quot;:32}},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;text&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;leaf&quot;},&quot;&quot;]]],[&quot;p&quot;,{&quot;uuid&quot;:&quot;m8s8il1lv8boy6r267l&quot;,&quot;ind&quot;:{&quot;firstLine&quot;:32}},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;text&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;leaf&quot;},&quot;而构造函数简单，我们的单元测试也会变得非常简单，比如针对下面代码进行测试：&quot;]]],[&quot;code&quot;,{&quot;syntax&quot;:&quot;python&quot;,&quot;theme&quot;:&quot;default&quot;,&quot;wrap&quot;:true,&quot;id&quot;:&quot;hcgndm&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;fold&quot;:false,&quot;hideHeader&quot;:false,&quot;codeFolding&quot;:false,&quot;showLineNumber&quot;:true,&quot;font&quot;:{&quot;fontFamily&quot;:&quot;defaultFont&quot;,&quot;ligatures&quot;:false},&quot;enableMacHeader&quot;:false,&quot;uuid&quot;:&quot;m8s8j5zipgvs7rznue&quot;,&quot;code&quot;:&quot;class UserReport:\n    def __init__(self, user, activities=None):\n        self.user = user\n        self.activities = activities or []\n        self.statistics = {}\n    \n    def calculate_statistics(self):\n        \&quot;\&quot;\&quot;计算统计数据\&quot;\&quot;\&quot;\n        login_count = len(self.activities)\n        active_days = len(set(a.date for a in self.activities))\n        self.statistics = {\n            \&quot;login_count\&quot;: login_count,\n            \&quot;active_days\&quot;: active_days\n        }\n        return self.statistics&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;text&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;leaf&quot;},&quot;class UserReport:\n    def __init__(self, user, activities=None):\n        self.user = user\n        self.activities = activities or []\n        self.statistics = {}\n    \n    def calculate_statistics(self):\n        \&quot;\&quot;\&quot;计算统计数据\&quot;\&quot;\&quot;\n        login_count = len(self.activities)\n        active_days = len(set(a.date for a in self.activities))\n        self.statistics = {\n            \&quot;login_count\&quot;: login_count,\n            \&quot;active_days\&quot;: active_days\n        }\n        return self.statistics&quot;]]],[&quot;p&quot;,{&quot;uuid&quot;:&quot;m8s8is0hg0ngzzudxjt&quot;,&quot;ind&quot;:{&quot;firstLine&quot;:32}},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;text&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;leaf&quot;},&quot;可以看到单元测试不再需要复杂的Mock&quot;]]],[&quot;code&quot;,{&quot;syntax&quot;:&quot;python&quot;,&quot;theme&quot;:&quot;default&quot;,&quot;wrap&quot;:true,&quot;id&quot;:&quot;u7pkhn&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;fold&quot;:false,&quot;hideHeader&quot;:false,&quot;codeFolding&quot;:false,&quot;showLineNumber&quot;:true,&quot;font&quot;:{&quot;fontFamily&quot;:&quot;defaultFont&quot;,&quot;ligatures&quot;:false},&quot;enableMacHeader&quot;:false,&quot;uuid&quot;:&quot;m8s8kakdgpmik61zhfm&quot;,&quot;code&quot;:&quot;def test_report_should_calculate_correct_statistics_when_activities_provided():\n    # 直接创建测试对象，无需模拟外部依赖\n    user = User(1, \&quot;Test User\&quot;, \&quot;test@example.com\&quot;)\n    activities = [\n        UserActivity(1, datetime(2023, 1, 1), \&quot;login\&quot;),\n        UserActivity(1, datetime(2023, 1, 2), \&quot;login\&quot;),\n        UserActivity(1, datetime(2023, 1, 2), \&quot;logout\&quot;)  # 同一天的另一个活动\n    ]\n    \n    # 创建对象非常简单\n    report = UserReport(user, activities)\n    \n    # 测试特定方法\n    stats = report.calculate_statistics()\n    \n    # 验证结果\n    assert stats[\&quot;login_count\&quot;] == 3\n    assert stats[\&quot;active_days\&quot;] == 2&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;text&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;leaf&quot;},&quot;def test_report_should_calculate_correct_statistics_when_activities_provided():\n    # 直接创建测试对象，无需模拟外部依赖\n    user = User(1, \&quot;Test User\&quot;, \&quot;test@example.com\&quot;)\n    activities = [\n        UserActivity(1, datetime(2023, 1, 1), \&quot;login\&quot;),\n        UserActivity(1, datetime(2023, 1, 2), \&quot;login\&quot;),\n        UserActivity(1, datetime(2023, 1, 2), \&quot;logout\&quot;)  # 同一天的另一个活动\n    ]\n    \n    # 创建对象非常简单\n    report = UserReport(user, activities)\n    \n    # 测试特定方法\n    stats = report.calculate_statistics()\n    \n    # 验证结果\n    assert stats[\&quot;login_count\&quot;] == 3\n    assert stats[\&quot;active_days\&quot;] == 2&quot;]]],[&quot;p&quot;,{&quot;uuid&quot;:&quot;m8s8k8qa8odh69udtp5&quot;,&quot;ind&quot;:{&quot;firstLine&quot;:32}},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;text&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;leaf&quot;},&quot;同时测试时，Mock对象注入也变得非常简单，如下：&quot;]]],[&quot;code&quot;,{&quot;syntax&quot;:&quot;python&quot;,&quot;theme&quot;:&quot;default&quot;,&quot;wrap&quot;:true,&quot;id&quot;:&quot;6dszfc&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;fold&quot;:false,&quot;hideHeader&quot;:false,&quot;codeFolding&quot;:false,&quot;showLineNumber&quot;:true,&quot;font&quot;:{&quot;fontFamily&quot;:&quot;defaultFont&quot;,&quot;ligatures&quot;:false},&quot;enableMacHeader&quot;:false,&quot;uuid&quot;:&quot;m8s8lb67dmxk9spatrj&quot;,&quot;code&quot;:&quot;def test_report_should_use_activity_source_when_calculating_statistics():\n    # 准备测试数据\n    user = User(42, \&quot;Test User\&quot;, \&quot;test@example.com\&quot;)\n    mock_activities = [\n        UserActivity(42, datetime(2023, 1, 1), \&quot;login\&quot;),\n        UserActivity(42, datetime(2023, 1, 2), \&quot;login\&quot;)\n    ]\n    \n    # 创建模拟数据源\n    activity_source = MockActivity(mock_activities)\n    \n    # 使用依赖注入\n    report = UserReport(user)\n    report.calculate_statistics(activity_source)\n    \n    # 验证结果\n    assert report.statistics[\&quot;login_count\&quot;] == 2\n    assert report.statistics[\&quot;active_days\&quot;] == 2&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;text&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;leaf&quot;},&quot;def test_report_should_use_activity_source_when_calculating_statistics():\n    # 准备测试数据\n    user = User(42, \&quot;Test User\&quot;, \&quot;test@example.com\&quot;)\n    mock_activities = [\n        UserActivity(42, datetime(2023, 1, 1), \&quot;login\&quot;),\n        UserActivity(42, datetime(2023, 1, 2), \&quot;login\&quot;)\n    ]\n    \n    # 创建模拟数据源\n    activity_source = MockActivity(mock_activities)\n    \n    # 使用依赖注入\n    report = UserReport(user)\n    report.calculate_statistics(activity_source)\n    \n    # 验证结果\n    assert report.statistics[\&quot;login_count\&quot;] == 2\n    assert report.statistics[\&quot;active_days\&quot;] == 2&quot;]]],[&quot;p&quot;,{&quot;uuid&quot;:&quot;m8s8l9seo3cygwfgpuk&quot;,&quot;ind&quot;:{&quot;firstLine&quot;:32}},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;text&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;leaf&quot;},&quot;而做边界值测试时更为简单：&quot;]]],[&quot;code&quot;,{&quot;syntax&quot;:&quot;python&quot;,&quot;theme&quot;:&quot;default&quot;,&quot;wrap&quot;:true,&quot;id&quot;:&quot;ta20sh&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;fold&quot;:false,&quot;hideHeader&quot;:false,&quot;codeFolding&quot;:false,&quot;showLineNumber&quot;:true,&quot;font&quot;:{&quot;fontFamily&quot;:&quot;defaultFont&quot;,&quot;ligatures&quot;:false},&quot;enableMacHeader&quot;:false,&quot;uuid&quot;:&quot;m8s8m9350vahc67owmwn&quot;,&quot;code&quot;:&quot;def test_statistics_should_be_empty_when_activities_list_is_empty():\n    user = User(1, \&quot;Test User\&quot;, \&quot;test@example.com\&quot;)\n    report = UserReport(user, [])  # 空活动列表\n    \n    stats = report.calculate_statistics()\n    assert stats[\&quot;login_count\&quot;] == 0\n    assert stats[\&quot;active_days\&quot;] == 0\n\ndef test_constructor_should_throw_exception_when_user_is_null():\n    # 测试无效用户情况\n    with pytest.raises(ValueError):\n        report = UserReport(None)  # 假设我们在构造函数中验证用户不为空&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;text&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;leaf&quot;},&quot;def test_statistics_should_be_empty_when_activities_list_is_empty():\n    user = User(1, \&quot;Test User\&quot;, \&quot;test@example.com\&quot;)\n    report = UserReport(user, [])  # 空活动列表\n    \n    stats = report.calculate_statistics()\n    assert stats[\&quot;login_count\&quot;] == 0\n    assert stats[\&quot;active_days\&quot;] == 0\n\ndef test_constructor_should_throw_exception_when_user_is_null():\n    # 测试无效用户情况\n    with pytest.raises(ValueError):\n        report = UserReport(None)  # 假设我们在构造函数中验证用户不为空&quot;]]],[&quot;p&quot;,{&quot;uuid&quot;:&quot;m8s8m73kkwfor2bklu&quot;,&quot;ind&quot;:{&quot;firstLine&quot;:32}},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;text&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;leaf&quot;},&quot;因此整个代码逻辑通过单元测试将变得更为健壮，而不是需要大量复杂的Mock，复杂的Mock会导致单元测试非常脆弱（也就是修改一点逻辑，导致现有的单元测试无效）&quot;]]],[&quot;p&quot;,{&quot;ind&quot;:{},&quot;uuid&quot;:&quot;m8rhndygu807zck8f0q&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;text&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;leaf&quot;},&quot;&quot;]]],[&quot;h2&quot;,{&quot;ind&quot;:{},&quot;uuid&quot;:&quot;m8rhsrukfnanatcttte&quot;,&quot;spacing&quot;:{&quot;before&quot;:21.333333333333332,&quot;after&quot;:9,&quot;line&quot;:0.8529411764705882}},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;text&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;bold&quot;:true,&quot;sz&quot;:16,&quot;szUnit&quot;:&quot;pt&quot;,&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;leaf&quot;},&quot;架构相关影响&quot;]]],[&quot;h3&quot;,{&quot;uuid&quot;:&quot;m8se8bneaxma46kgxlb&quot;,&quot;spacing&quot;:{&quot;before&quot;:18.666666666666664,&quot;after&quot;:8,&quot;line&quot;:0.8529411764705882}},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;text&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;bold&quot;:true,&quot;sz&quot;:14,&quot;szUnit&quot;:&quot;pt&quot;,&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;leaf&quot;},&quot;更容易依赖注入&quot;]]],[&quot;p&quot;,{&quot;uuid&quot;:&quot;m8se8e710o7coonllyog&quot;,&quot;ind&quot;:{&quot;firstLine&quot;:32}},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;text&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;leaf&quot;},&quot;依赖注入的核心理念是高层模块不应该依赖于低层模块的实现细节，而应该依赖于抽象。好比我们需要打车去公司上班，我们只要打开滴滴输入目的地，我们更高层次的需求是从A到B，而具体的实现细节是打车过程是哪款车，或者司机是谁，这也不是我们关心的。具体由哪辆车，哪位司机提供服务可以随时切换。&quot;]]],[&quot;p&quot;,{&quot;uuid&quot;:&quot;m8se8e720cdxbbaq1bgd&quot;,&quot;ind&quot;:{&quot;firstLine&quot;:32}},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;text&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;leaf&quot;},&quot;依赖注入是现代软件架构的核心实践之一，而简单的构造函数设计是实现有效依赖注入的基础。通过构造函数注入依赖，我们可以构建松耦合、高内聚的系统，显著提高代码的可维护性和可扩展性。&quot;]]],[&quot;code&quot;,{&quot;syntax&quot;:&quot;python&quot;,&quot;theme&quot;:&quot;default&quot;,&quot;wrap&quot;:true,&quot;id&quot;:&quot;my30nd&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;fold&quot;:false,&quot;hideHeader&quot;:false,&quot;codeFolding&quot;:false,&quot;showLineNumber&quot;:true,&quot;font&quot;:{&quot;fontFamily&quot;:&quot;defaultFont&quot;,&quot;ligatures&quot;:false},&quot;enableMacHeader&quot;:false,&quot;uuid&quot;:&quot;m8se9lrdrdzwcegjoyh&quot;,&quot;code&quot;:&quot;# 直接在类内部创建依赖\nclass UserReport:\n    def __init__(self, user_id):\n        self.user_id = user_id\n        # 直接依赖具体实现\n        self.database = MySQLDatabase()\n        self.user = self.database.fetch_user(user_id)&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;text&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;leaf&quot;},&quot;# 直接在类内部创建依赖\nclass UserReport:\n    def __init__(self, user_id):\n        self.user_id = user_id\n        # 直接依赖具体实现\n        self.database = MySQLDatabase()\n        self.user = self.database.fetch_user(user_id)&quot;]]],[&quot;code&quot;,{&quot;syntax&quot;:&quot;python&quot;,&quot;theme&quot;:&quot;default&quot;,&quot;wrap&quot;:true,&quot;id&quot;:&quot;x19fsm&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;fold&quot;:false,&quot;hideHeader&quot;:false,&quot;codeFolding&quot;:false,&quot;showLineNumber&quot;:true,&quot;font&quot;:{&quot;fontFamily&quot;:&quot;defaultFont&quot;,&quot;ligatures&quot;:false},&quot;enableMacHeader&quot;:false,&quot;uuid&quot;:&quot;m8sea2fe8k9gl1uzoc2&quot;,&quot;code&quot;:&quot;# 通过构造函数注入依赖\nclass UserReport:\n    def __init__(self, user, activity_source):\n        self.user = user\n        self.activity_source = activity_source\n        self.statistics = {}\n    \n    def calculate_statistics(self):\n        activities = self.activity_source.get_activities(self.user.id)\n        # 计算逻辑...&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;text&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;leaf&quot;},&quot;# 通过构造函数注入依赖\nclass UserReport:\n    def __init__(self, user, activity_source):\n        self.user = user\n        self.activity_source = activity_source\n        self.statistics = {}\n    \n    def calculate_statistics(self):\n        activities = self.activity_source.get_activities(self.user.id)\n        # 计算逻辑...&quot;]]],[&quot;p&quot;,{&quot;uuid&quot;:&quot;m8se8e73z4fhnilb058&quot;,&quot;ind&quot;:{&quot;firstLine&quot;:32}},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;text&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;leaf&quot;},&quot;通过第二段代码可以看到更容易实现依赖注入，通常实际使用中还结合依赖注入容器（IoC）自动化依赖的创建和注入，但这超出本篇的篇幅了。&quot;]]],[&quot;p&quot;,{&quot;uuid&quot;:&quot;m8seb8ntvs43b33ww&quot;,&quot;ind&quot;:{&quot;firstLine&quot;:32}},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;text&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;leaf&quot;},&quot;&quot;]]],[&quot;h3&quot;,{&quot;ind&quot;:{},&quot;uuid&quot;:&quot;m8rht5bhe6hhtmeldv&quot;,&quot;spacing&quot;:{&quot;before&quot;:18.666666666666664,&quot;after&quot;:8,&quot;line&quot;:0.8529411764705882}},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;text&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;bold&quot;:true,&quot;sz&quot;:14,&quot;szUnit&quot;:&quot;pt&quot;,&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;leaf&quot;},&quot;&quot;]]],[&quot;h3&quot;,{&quot;ind&quot;:{},&quot;uuid&quot;:&quot;m8rhtxbl1gkz0a6ur0l&quot;,&quot;spacing&quot;:{&quot;before&quot;:18.666666666666664,&quot;after&quot;:8,&quot;line&quot;:0.8529411764705882}},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;text&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;bold&quot;:true,&quot;sz&quot;:14,&quot;szUnit&quot;:&quot;pt&quot;,&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;leaf&quot;},&quot;更容易暴露设计问题&quot;]]],[&quot;p&quot;,{&quot;ind&quot;:{&quot;firstLine&quot;:32},&quot;uuid&quot;:&quot;m8rhk1mlaajoghkmt7h&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;text&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;leaf&quot;},&quot;构造函数仅做赋值操作，还能更容易得暴露类的设计问题。当构造函数变得臃肿或复杂时，这通常表明存在更深层次的设计缺陷。&quot;]]],[&quot;p&quot;,{&quot;ind&quot;:{&quot;firstLine&quot;:32},&quot;uuid&quot;:&quot;m8sen9asmocfgwutd2s&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;text&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;leaf&quot;},&quot;比如一个类的构造函数有大量参数时，通常意味着类承担过多的职责，比如：&quot;]]],[&quot;code&quot;,{&quot;syntax&quot;:&quot;python&quot;,&quot;theme&quot;:&quot;default&quot;,&quot;wrap&quot;:true,&quot;id&quot;:&quot;9cmngf&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;fold&quot;:false,&quot;hideHeader&quot;:false,&quot;codeFolding&quot;:false,&quot;showLineNumber&quot;:true,&quot;font&quot;:{&quot;fontFamily&quot;:&quot;defaultFont&quot;,&quot;ligatures&quot;:false},&quot;enableMacHeader&quot;:false,&quot;uuid&quot;:&quot;m8senypypuxyhyr67fq&quot;,&quot;code&quot;:&quot;# 需要引起警觉：参数过多的构造函数\nclass UserReport:\n    def __init__(self, user, activity_list, login_calculator, active_days_calculator, \n                visualization_tool, report_exporter, notification_system):\n        self.user = user\n        self.activity_list = activity_list\n        self.login_calculator = login_calculator  \n        self.active_days_calculator = active_days_calculator\n        self.visualization_tool = visualization_tool\n        self.report_exporter = report_exporter\n        self.notification_system = notification_system\n        self.statistics = {}&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;text&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;leaf&quot;},&quot;# 需要引起警觉：参数过多的构造函数\nclass UserReport:\n    def __init__(self, user, activity_list, login_calculator, active_days_calculator, \n                visualization_tool, report_exporter, notification_system):\n        self.user = user\n        self.activity_list = activity_list\n        self.login_calculator = login_calculator  \n        self.active_days_calculator = active_days_calculator\n        self.visualization_tool = visualization_tool\n        self.report_exporter = report_exporter\n        self.notification_system = notification_system\n        self.statistics = {}&quot;]]],[&quot;p&quot;,{&quot;ind&quot;:{},&quot;uuid&quot;:&quot;m8senswt8hh9b4lxxu&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;text&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;leaf&quot;},&quot;&quot;]]],[&quot;p&quot;,{&quot;ind&quot;:{&quot;firstLine&quot;:32},&quot;uuid&quot;:&quot;m8set5qglbw4oz6q9xa&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;text&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;leaf&quot;},&quot;一个常见的解决思路是使用Builder模式，让初始化过程更加优雅，但这通常只能掩盖问题，而不是解决问题&quot;]]],[&quot;p&quot;,{&quot;ind&quot;:{&quot;firstLine&quot;:32},&quot;uuid&quot;:&quot;m8seusuvtw4l10khwto&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;text&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;leaf&quot;},&quot;因此可以将过多参数的构造函数当做red flag，正确的解决办法是重新查看类的设计，进行职责分离：&quot;]]],[&quot;code&quot;,{&quot;syntax&quot;:&quot;python&quot;,&quot;theme&quot;:&quot;default&quot;,&quot;wrap&quot;:true,&quot;id&quot;:&quot;v4vxnu&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;fold&quot;:false,&quot;hideHeader&quot;:false,&quot;codeFolding&quot;:false,&quot;showLineNumber&quot;:true,&quot;font&quot;:{&quot;fontFamily&quot;:&quot;defaultFont&quot;,&quot;ligatures&quot;:false},&quot;enableMacHeader&quot;:false,&quot;uuid&quot;:&quot;m8sevc60ybj4cvamhbj&quot;,&quot;code&quot;:&quot;# 核心报告类，只关注数据和基本统计\nclass UserReport:\n    def __init__(self, user, activities):\n        self.user = user\n        self.activities = activities\n        self.statistics = {}\n    \n    def calculate(self, calculator):\n        self.statistics = calculator.compute(self.activities)\n        return self\n\n# 分离的统计计算\nclass ActivityStatistics:\n    def compute(self, activities):\n        login_count = len([a for a in activities if a.action == 'login'])\n        unique_days = len(set(a.date for a in activities))\n        return {\&quot;logins\&quot;: login_count, \&quot;active_days\&quot;: unique_days}\n\n# 分离的报告导出功能\nclass ReportExport:\n    def to_pdf(self, report):\n        # PDF导出逻辑\n        pass\n    \n    def to_excel(self, report):\n        # Excel导出逻辑\n        pass\n\n# 分离的通知功能\nclass ReportNotification:\n    def send(self, report, recipients):\n        # 发送通知逻辑\n        pass&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;text&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;leaf&quot;},&quot;# 核心报告类，只关注数据和基本统计\nclass UserReport:\n    def __init__(self, user, activities):\n        self.user = user\n        self.activities = activities\n        self.statistics = {}\n    \n    def calculate(self, calculator):\n        self.statistics = calculator.compute(self.activities)\n        return self\n\n# 分离的统计计算\nclass ActivityStatistics:\n    def compute(self, activities):\n        login_count = len([a for a in activities if a.action == 'login'])\n        unique_days = len(set(a.date for a in activities))\n        return {\&quot;logins\&quot;: login_count, \&quot;active_days\&quot;: unique_days}\n\n# 分离的报告导出功能\nclass ReportExport:\n    def to_pdf(self, report):\n        # PDF导出逻辑\n        pass\n    \n    def to_excel(self, report):\n        # Excel导出逻辑\n        pass\n\n# 分离的通知功能\nclass ReportNotification:\n    def send(self, report, recipients):\n        # 发送通知逻辑\n        pass&quot;]]],[&quot;p&quot;,{&quot;ind&quot;:{&quot;firstLine&quot;:32},&quot;uuid&quot;:&quot;m8seva5fr8jv295upyq&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;text&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;leaf&quot;},&quot;那么类的调用就会变得非常清晰：&quot;]]],[&quot;code&quot;,{&quot;syntax&quot;:&quot;python&quot;,&quot;theme&quot;:&quot;default&quot;,&quot;wrap&quot;:true,&quot;id&quot;:&quot;8i8dcg&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;fold&quot;:false,&quot;hideHeader&quot;:false,&quot;codeFolding&quot;:false,&quot;showLineNumber&quot;:true,&quot;font&quot;:{&quot;fontFamily&quot;:&quot;defaultFont&quot;,&quot;ligatures&quot;:false},&quot;enableMacHeader&quot;:false,&quot;uuid&quot;:&quot;m8sews23ix3lidqathe&quot;,&quot;code&quot;:&quot;# 清晰的职责分离\nuser = User(42, \&quot;John Doe\&quot;, \&quot;john@example.com\&quot;)\nactivities = activity_database.get_user_activities(user.id)\n\n# 创建和计算报告\ncalculator = ActivityStatistics()\nreport = UserReport(user, activities).calculate(calculator)\n\n# 导出报告（如果需要）\nif export_needed:\n    exporter = ReportExport()\n    pdf_file = exporter.to_pdf(report)\n\n# 发送通知（如果需要）\nif notify_admin:\n    notifier = ReportNotification()\n    notifier.send(report, [\&quot;admin@example.com\&quot;])&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;text&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;leaf&quot;},&quot;# 清晰的职责分离\nuser = User(42, \&quot;John Doe\&quot;, \&quot;john@example.com\&quot;)\nactivities = activity_database.get_user_activities(user.id)\n\n# 创建和计算报告\ncalculator = ActivityStatistics()\nreport = UserReport(user, activities).calculate(calculator)\n\n# 导出报告（如果需要）\nif export_needed:\n    exporter = ReportExport()\n    pdf_file = exporter.to_pdf(report)\n\n# 发送通知（如果需要）\nif notify_admin:\n    notifier = ReportNotification()\n    notifier.send(report, [\&quot;admin@example.com\&quot;])&quot;]]],[&quot;p&quot;,{&quot;ind&quot;:{&quot;firstLine&quot;:32},&quot;uuid&quot;:&quot;m8sewqd8byu8kcnojhf&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;text&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;leaf&quot;},&quot;这种方式每个类都有明确的单一职责，构造函数简单明了，同时功能可以按需组合使用以及测试变得简单（可以单独测试每个组件）。&quot;]]],[&quot;p&quot;,{&quot;ind&quot;:{},&quot;uuid&quot;:&quot;m8rhnem5yf0mk2k20qs&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;text&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;leaf&quot;},&quot;&quot;]]],[&quot;h1&quot;,{&quot;ind&quot;:{},&quot;uuid&quot;:&quot;m8rho3k5hzpqod84ee8&quot;,&quot;spacing&quot;:{&quot;before&quot;:26.666666666666664,&quot;after&quot;:9,&quot;line&quot;:0.8529411764705882}},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;text&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;bold&quot;:true,&quot;sz&quot;:20,&quot;szUnit&quot;:&quot;pt&quot;,&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;leaf&quot;},&quot;特例&quot;]]],[&quot;p&quot;,{&quot;ind&quot;:{&quot;firstLine&quot;:32},&quot;uuid&quot;:&quot;m8rho598l9w8l33quvq&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;text&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;leaf&quot;},&quot;某些情况下，构造函数除了赋值，还可以做一些其他工作也是合理的，如下：&quot;]]],[&quot;h2&quot;,{&quot;ind&quot;:{},&quot;uuid&quot;:&quot;m8rhqp12ricxlz8b9n&quot;,&quot;spacing&quot;:{&quot;before&quot;:21.333333333333332,&quot;after&quot;:9,&quot;line&quot;:0.8529411764705882}},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;text&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;bold&quot;:true,&quot;sz&quot;:16,&quot;szUnit&quot;:&quot;pt&quot;,&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;leaf&quot;},&quot;参数合法性检查&quot;]]],[&quot;p&quot;,{&quot;uuid&quot;:&quot;m8sfbhtdcvvzz0ldegg&quot;,&quot;ind&quot;:{&quot;firstLine&quot;:32}},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;text&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;leaf&quot;},&quot;在构造函数中进行基本的参数验证是合理的，这确保对象从创建之初就处于有效状态，例如下面例子，只要构造函数不进行外部依赖操作或复杂的逻辑运算都是合理的&quot;]]],[&quot;code&quot;,{&quot;syntax&quot;:&quot;python&quot;,&quot;theme&quot;:&quot;default&quot;,&quot;wrap&quot;:true,&quot;id&quot;:&quot;www3gq&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;fold&quot;:false,&quot;hideHeader&quot;:false,&quot;codeFolding&quot;:false,&quot;showLineNumber&quot;:true,&quot;font&quot;:{&quot;fontFamily&quot;:&quot;defaultFont&quot;,&quot;ligatures&quot;:false},&quot;enableMacHeader&quot;:false,&quot;uuid&quot;:&quot;m8sfe2e69jgfjl6lgwv&quot;,&quot;code&quot;:&quot;class User:\n    def __init__(self, id, name, email):\n        # 基本参数验证\n        if id <= 0:\n            raise ValueError(\&quot;User ID must be positive\&quot;)\n        if not name or not name.strip():\n            raise ValueError(\&quot;User name cannot be empty\&quot;)\n        if not email or \&quot;@\&quot; not in email:\n            raise ValueError(\&quot;Invalid email format\&quot;)\n        \n        self.id = id\n        self.name = name\n        self.email = email&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;text&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;leaf&quot;},&quot;class User:\n    def __init__(self, id, name, email):\n        # 基本参数验证\n        if id <= 0:\n            raise ValueError(\&quot;User ID must be positive\&quot;)\n        if not name or not name.strip():\n            raise ValueError(\&quot;User name cannot be empty\&quot;)\n        if not email or \&quot;@\&quot; not in email:\n            raise ValueError(\&quot;Invalid email format\&quot;)\n        \n        self.id = id\n        self.name = name\n        self.email = email&quot;]]],[&quot;p&quot;,{&quot;uuid&quot;:&quot;m8sfe1anxrwa96z9qi&quot;,&quot;ind&quot;:{&quot;firstLine&quot;:32}},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;text&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;leaf&quot;},&quot;&quot;]]],[&quot;h2&quot;,{&quot;ind&quot;:{},&quot;uuid&quot;:&quot;m8rhri2ozlaj7xa4e8p&quot;,&quot;spacing&quot;:{&quot;before&quot;:21.333333333333332,&quot;after&quot;:9,&quot;line&quot;:0.8529411764705882}},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;text&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;bold&quot;:true,&quot;sz&quot;:16,&quot;szUnit&quot;:&quot;pt&quot;,&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;leaf&quot;},&quot;简单的派生值计算&quot;]]],[&quot;p&quot;,{&quot;uuid&quot;:&quot;m8sfer44v1yaxkjcr2&quot;,&quot;ind&quot;:{&quot;firstLine&quot;:32}},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;text&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;leaf&quot;},&quot;有时，在构造函数中计算一些简单的派生值是合理的，只要在整个类声明周期，计算后的值都不变：&quot;]]],[&quot;code&quot;,{&quot;syntax&quot;:&quot;python&quot;,&quot;theme&quot;:&quot;default&quot;,&quot;wrap&quot;:true,&quot;id&quot;:&quot;i3p7yt&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;fold&quot;:false,&quot;hideHeader&quot;:false,&quot;codeFolding&quot;:false,&quot;showLineNumber&quot;:true,&quot;font&quot;:{&quot;fontFamily&quot;:&quot;defaultFont&quot;,&quot;ligatures&quot;:false},&quot;enableMacHeader&quot;:false,&quot;uuid&quot;:&quot;m8sffofwfdujtmvzgso&quot;,&quot;code&quot;:&quot;class Rectangle:\n    def __init__(self, width, height):\n        if width <= 0 or height <= 0:\n            raise ValueError(\&quot;Dimensions must be positive\&quot;)\n        \n        self.width = width\n        self.height = height\n        # 简单的派生值计算\n        self.area = width * height\n        self.perimeter = 2 * (width + height)&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;text&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;leaf&quot;},&quot;class Rectangle:\n    def __init__(self, width, height):\n        if width <= 0 or height <= 0:\n            raise ValueError(\&quot;Dimensions must be positive\&quot;)\n        \n        self.width = width\n        self.height = height\n        # 简单的派生值计算\n        self.area = width * height\n        self.perimeter = 2 * (width + height)&quot;]]],[&quot;p&quot;,{&quot;uuid&quot;:&quot;m8sffj0v0wqv3y6089pj&quot;,&quot;ind&quot;:{&quot;firstLine&quot;:32}},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;text&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;leaf&quot;},&quot;&quot;]]],[&quot;h2&quot;,{&quot;ind&quot;:{},&quot;uuid&quot;:&quot;m8rhrrewmvi6wuce8ub&quot;,&quot;spacing&quot;:{&quot;before&quot;:21.333333333333332,&quot;after&quot;:9,&quot;line&quot;:0.8529411764705882}},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;text&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;bold&quot;:true,&quot;sz&quot;:16,&quot;szUnit&quot;:&quot;pt&quot;,&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;leaf&quot;},&quot;不可变对象的初始化&quot;]]],[&quot;p&quot;,{&quot;uuid&quot;:&quot;m8sfgbfg5kf67cnnq07&quot;,&quot;ind&quot;:{&quot;firstLine&quot;:32}},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;text&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;leaf&quot;},&quot;对于不可变对象（创建后状态不能改变的对象），构造函数需要完成所有必要的初始化工作：&quot;]]],[&quot;code&quot;,{&quot;syntax&quot;:&quot;python&quot;,&quot;theme&quot;:&quot;default&quot;,&quot;wrap&quot;:true,&quot;id&quot;:&quot;uyywkl&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;fold&quot;:false,&quot;hideHeader&quot;:false,&quot;codeFolding&quot;:false,&quot;showLineNumber&quot;:true,&quot;font&quot;:{&quot;fontFamily&quot;:&quot;defaultFont&quot;,&quot;ligatures&quot;:false},&quot;enableMacHeader&quot;:false,&quot;uuid&quot;:&quot;m8sfgzwqal0ezzhuo3t&quot;,&quot;code&quot;:&quot;class ImmutablePoint:\n    def __init__(self, x, y):\n        self._x = x\n        self._y = y\n        # 预计算常用值\n        self._distance_from_origin = (x**2 + y**2)**0.5\n    \n    @property\n    def x(self):\n        return self._x\n    \n    @property\n    def y(self):\n        return self._y\n    \n    @property\n    def distance_from_origin(self):\n        return self._distance_from_origin&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;text&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;leaf&quot;},&quot;class ImmutablePoint:\n    def __init__(self, x, y):\n        self._x = x\n        self._y = y\n        # 预计算常用值\n        self._distance_from_origin = (x**2 + y**2)**0.5\n    \n    @property\n    def x(self):\n        return self._x\n    \n    @property\n    def y(self):\n        return self._y\n    \n    @property\n    def distance_from_origin(self):\n        return self._distance_from_origin&quot;]]],[&quot;p&quot;,{&quot;uuid&quot;:&quot;m8sfgcogjr2mr5moooc&quot;,&quot;ind&quot;:{&quot;firstLine&quot;:32}},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;text&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;leaf&quot;},&quot;&quot;]]],[&quot;p&quot;,{&quot;ind&quot;:{},&quot;uuid&quot;:&quot;m8rhrx7prr99yx1f3i&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;text&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;leaf&quot;},&quot;&quot;]]],[&quot;h1&quot;,{&quot;ind&quot;:{},&quot;uuid&quot;:&quot;m8rhvrgx1fx8yu8kkdm&quot;,&quot;spacing&quot;:{&quot;before&quot;:26.666666666666664,&quot;after&quot;:9,&quot;line&quot;:0.8529411764705882}},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;text&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;bold&quot;:true,&quot;sz&quot;:20,&quot;szUnit&quot;:&quot;pt&quot;,&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;leaf&quot;},&quot;小结&quot;]]],[&quot;p&quot;,{&quot;ind&quot;:{&quot;firstLine&quot;:32},&quot;uuid&quot;:&quot;m8rhlqkadf10cy6kn2p&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;text&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;leaf&quot;},&quot;一个设计合理的构造函数，是打造易维护、易测试、易扩展系统的基础。我们应始终坚持构造函数「仅做赋值和必要的基础验证」这一原则，使代码更为清晰和灵活。&quot;]]],[&quot;p&quot;,{&quot;uuid&quot;:&quot;m8sf11bv8qiq3laq1e5&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;text&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;leaf&quot;},&quot;简单的构造函数能带来以下优势：&quot;]]],[&quot;p&quot;,{&quot;list&quot;:{&quot;listId&quot;:&quot;kz7hbdh1jq&quot;,&quot;isOrdered&quot;:false,&quot;level&quot;:0,&quot;listStyle&quot;:{&quot;format&quot;:&quot;bullet&quot;,&quot;text&quot;:&quot;●&quot;,&quot;align&quot;:&quot;left&quot;}},&quot;uuid&quot;:&quot;m8sf11bv51ofvedll4&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;text&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;bold&quot;:true,&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;leaf&quot;},&quot;易于维护&quot;],[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;leaf&quot;},&quot;：职责单一、副作用少，便于后续的调试与迭代。&quot;]]],[&quot;p&quot;,{&quot;list&quot;:{&quot;listId&quot;:&quot;kz7hbdh1jq&quot;,&quot;isOrdered&quot;:false,&quot;level&quot;:0,&quot;listStyle&quot;:{&quot;format&quot;:&quot;bullet&quot;,&quot;text&quot;:&quot;●&quot;,&quot;align&quot;:&quot;left&quot;}},&quot;uuid&quot;:&quot;m8sf11bv8qh0i20wszn&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;text&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;bold&quot;:true,&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;leaf&quot;},&quot;易于测试&quot;],[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;leaf&quot;},&quot;：不依赖外部环境，能轻松实现模拟和单元测试。&quot;]]],[&quot;p&quot;,{&quot;list&quot;:{&quot;listId&quot;:&quot;kz7hbdh1jq&quot;,&quot;isOrdered&quot;:false,&quot;level&quot;:0,&quot;listStyle&quot;:{&quot;format&quot;:&quot;bullet&quot;,&quot;text&quot;:&quot;●&quot;,&quot;align&quot;:&quot;left&quot;}},&quot;uuid&quot;:&quot;m8sf11bv8qv0gx0u61v&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;text&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;bold&quot;:true,&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;leaf&quot;},&quot;架构更清晰&quot;],[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;leaf&quot;},&quot;：便于实现依赖注入，更符合SOLID原则，也能更快地识别设计上的问题。&quot;]]],[&quot;p&quot;,{&quot;uuid&quot;:&quot;m8sf11bvs1yf8jmu96&quot;,&quot;ind&quot;:{&quot;firstLine&quot;:32}},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;text&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;leaf&quot;},&quot;当我们发现构造函数开始复杂化，参数越来越多时，这通常是代码设计本身出现了问题，而不是一个能用Builder模式等技巧快速掩盖的问题。正确的做法是退一步重新审视类的职责，及时进行重构。&quot;]]],[&quot;p&quot;,{&quot;uuid&quot;:&quot;m8sf11bw9t1l7a4ffq&quot;,&quot;ind&quot;:{&quot;firstLine&quot;:32}},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;text&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;leaf&quot;},&quot;当然，在实际编码过程中，有时候我们可能会做出一定程度的妥协，例如对参数进行基本合法性检查、简单的数据派生计算，或者初始化不可变对象。这些情况应该是少数的例外，而不是普遍的规则。&quot;]]],[&quot;p&quot;,{&quot;uuid&quot;:&quot;m8sf11bwbfe2wnwmx66&quot;,&quot;ind&quot;:{&quot;firstLine&quot;:32}},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;text&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;leaf&quot;},&quot;总之，通过保持构造函数的简洁和直观，我们不仅能够写出高质量的代码，更能及早发现和解决潜在的设计问题，使整个系统更加稳固和易于维护。&quot;]]],[&quot;p&quot;,{&quot;ind&quot;:{},&quot;uuid&quot;:&quot;m8rhlqpsisiej8cvumf&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;text&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;leaf&quot;},&quot;&quot;]]]]" data-identifier-application__slash__x-cangjie-fragment="" data-identifier-application__slash__x-doc-key="YdgOkpyMMJ4Zl4BX">
<p><span data-type="text">最近在做一些代码重构，涉及到Python中部分代码重构后，单元测试实现较为麻烦甚至难以实现的场景，其中一个主要的原因是构造函数过于复杂。</span></p>
<p><span data-type="text">因此，本篇文章借此总结一下我们应该需要什么样的构造函数。本篇文章涉及的概念不仅限于Python。</span></p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<h1><span data-type="text">构造函数是什么</span></h1>
<p><span data-type="text">构造函数用于创建对象时触发，如果不自定义构造函数，通常现代的编程语言在编译时会自动加一个无参的构造函数，同时将类成员设置成默认值，Python中需要定义对象成员才能访问，而类C语言比如C#中int、bool、float等都会设置为0等值的值，比如整数为0、浮点数为0.0或布尔值为false，对于非原始值的引用类型，比如String或Class，都会设置为Null。</span></p>
<p><span data-type="text">构造函数是对类初始化非常合理的位置。因为构造函数是新建对象时触发，相比对象构造之后再去修改对象属性，带来的麻烦远比收益多，比如说空指针、时序耦合、多线程问题等，这些有兴趣后续有机会再聊，但总之将类的初始化放到构造函数中就像是先打地基再盖房子，而不是房子盖一半再回头修补地基，也避免类处于“半成品”状态。</span></p>
<p><span data-type="text">虽然构造函数应该做完整的工作避免半成品，但如果给构造函数赋予太多的责任，会对系统带来很多麻烦，就好比房子主体结构（构造函数）还没完工，就要搬家具进房屋，通常会带来不必要的负担。</span></p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<h1><span data-type="text">我们需要什么样的构造函数</span></h1>
<p><span data-type="text">一句话总结：在我看来，构造函数只应该做赋值，以及最基本的参数校验。而不应该做外部调用和复杂的初始化，使用简单构造函数能够带来如下好处：</span></p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<h2><span data-type="text">可维护性</span></h2>
<h3><span data-type="text">单一职责，避免惊喜</span></h3>
<p><span data-type="text">构造函数也应当遵循单一职责原则，仅负责对象的初始化和基本验证，而不应包含其他复杂操作。当构造函数承担过多责任时，会产生意外的"惊喜"，使代码难以理解和维护。</span></p>
<p><span data-type="text">例如下面代码，在构造函数中执行了数据库查询操作（外部依赖），以及统计计算（无外部依赖，复杂的内部计算），我们很难一眼看出该函数初始化要做什么，增加阅读和理解代码的认知负担。</span></p>
<pre class="highlighter-hljs"><code>class UserReport:
    def __init__(self, user_id):
        self.user_id = user_id
        # 构造函数中进行数据库操作（有外部依赖）
        self.user = database.fetch_user(user_id)
        # 构造函数中执行复杂计算（内部复杂计算，无外部依赖）
        self.statistics = self._calculate_statistics()
    
    def _calculate_statistics(self):
        # 假设是一个复杂的统计计算
        return {"login_count": 42, "active_days": 15}</code></pre>
<p><span data-type="text">而理想的构造函数，应该只是简单做“初始化赋值”这一个操作，如下所示：</span></p>
<pre class="highlighter-hljs"><code>class UserReport:
    def __init__(self, user, statistics):
        """构造函数只负责初始化，不执行其他操作"""
        self.user = user
        self.statistics = statistics</code></pre>
<p><span data-type="text">该构造函数只做初始化赋值，没有预期之外的情况，比如例子中_calculate_statistics函数，如果在方法内继续引用其他类，其他类再次有外部依赖的访问（比如IO、API调用、数据库操作等），会产生惊喜。</span></p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<h3><span data-type="text">减少意外的副作用</span></h3>
<p><span data-type="text">构造函数中包含复杂操作不仅违反单一职责原则，还可能带来意外的副作用。这些副作用可能导致系统行为不可预测，增加调试难度，甚至引发难以察觉的bug。</span></p>
<p><span data-type="text">我们继续看之前的代码示例：</span></p>
<pre class="highlighter-hljs"><code>class UserReport:
    def __init__(self, user_id):
        self.user_id = user_id
        # 构造函数中进行数据库操作
        self.user = database.fetch_user(user_id)
        # 构造函数中执行复杂计算
        self.statistics = self._calculate_statistics()
    
    def _calculate_statistics(self):
        # 复杂的统计计算
        data = database.fetch_user_activities(self.user_id)
        if not data:
            # 可能抛出异常
            raise ValueError(f"No activity data for user {self.user_id}")
        return {"login_count": len(data), "active_days": len(set(d.date() for d in data))}</code></pre>
<p><span data-type="text">这段代码可以看到，_calculate_statistics() 函数有数据库访问，这是隐藏的依赖，同时如果数据库访问存在异常可能导致整个对象创建失败，调用者只想创建对象，却可能引发了数据库无法连接的异常。这在运行时都属于意外。</span></p>
<pre class="highlighter-hljs"><code>Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "main.py", line 42, in &lt;module&gt;
    report = UserReport(user_id=1001)  # 调用者只是想创建一个报告对象
  File "user_report.py", line 5, in __init__
    self.user = database.fetch_user(user_id)  # 数据库查询可能失败
  File "database.py", line 78, in fetch_user
    user_data = self._execute_query(f"SELECT * FROM users WHERE id = {user_id}")
  File "database.py", line 31, in _execute_query
    connection = self._get_connection()
  File "database.py", line 15, in _get_connection
    return pymysql.connect(host=self.host, user=self.user, password=self.password, db=self.db_name)
  File "/usr/local/lib/python3.8/site-packages/pymysql/__init__.py", line 94, in Connect
    return Connection(*args, **kwargs)
  File "/usr/local/lib/python3.8/site-packages/pymysql/connections.py", line 327, in __init__
    self.connect()
  File "/usr/local/lib/python3.8/site-packages/pymysql/connections.py", line 629, in connect
    raise exc
pymysql.err.OperationalError: (2003, "Can't connect to MySQL server on 'db.example.com' (timed out)")</code></pre>
<p><span data-type="text">而将计算逻辑提取到专门函数，访问外部依赖的逻辑通过注入进行，就不会存在该问题：</span></p>
<pre class="highlighter-hljs"><code>class UserReport:
    def __init__(self, user, statistics=None):
        """构造函数只负责初始化，无副作用"""
        self.user = user
        self.statistics = statistics if statistics is not None else {}
    
    def calculate_statistics(self, activity_source):
        """将计算逻辑分离到专门的方法，并接受依赖注入"""
        activities = activity_source.get_activities(self.user.id)
        self.statistics = {
            "login_count": len(activities),
            "active_days": len(set(a.date for a in activities))
        }
        return self.statistics

class UserActivity:
    def __init__(self, user_id, date, action):
        self.user_id = user_id
        self.date = date
        self.action = action

class DatabaseActivity:
    def get_activities(self, user_id):
        # 实际应用中会查询数据库
        return database.fetch_user_activities(user_id)</code></pre>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<h3><span data-type="text">方便调试和演进</span></h3>
<p><span data-type="text">构造函数仅负责简单的初始化时，代码变得更加易于调试和演进。相比之下，包含复杂逻辑的构造函数会使问题定位和系统扩展变得困难。比如下面例子</span></p>
<pre class="highlighter-hljs"><code>class UserReport:
    def __init__(self, user_id):
        self.user_id = user_id
        self.user = database.fetch_user(user_id)
        self.activities = database.fetch_user_activities(user_id)
        self.statistics = self._calculate_statistics()
        self.recommendations = self._generate_recommendations()
        # 更多复杂逻辑...</code></pre>
<p><span data-type="text">可以看到构造函数包括了太多可能失败的点，调试时也不容易找到具体哪一行除了问题。而下面方式调试容易很多：</span></p>
<pre class="highlighter-hljs"><code>class UserReport:
    def __init__(self, user, activities=None, statistics=None, recommendations=None):
        self.user = user
        self.activities = activities or []
        self.statistics = statistics or {}
        self.recommendations = recommendations or []</code></pre>
<p><span data-type="text">而演进时，复杂的构造函数有很大风险，例如：</span></p>
<pre class="highlighter-hljs"><code># 需要修改原有构造函数，风险很高
class UserReport:
    def __init__(self, user_id, month=None):  # 添加新参数
        self.user_id = user_id
        self.user = database.fetch_user(user_id)
        # 修改现有逻辑
        if month:
            self.activities = database.fetch_user_activities_by_month(user_id, month)
        else:
            self.activities = database.fetch_user_activities(user_id)
        # 以下计算可能需要调整
        self.statistics = self._calculate_statistics()
        self.recommendations = self._generate_recommendations()</code></pre>
<p><span data-type="text">我们需要添加按月筛选活动数据，增加一个参数，这种情况也是实际代码维护中经常出现的，想到哪写到哪，导致构造函数变的非常复杂难以理解，同时增加出错可能性，而更好的方式如下：</span></p>
<pre class="highlighter-hljs"><code>class UserReport:
    def __init__(self, user, activities=None, statistics=None, recommendations=None):
        self.user = user
        self.activities = activities or []
        self.statistics = statistics or {}
        self.recommendations = recommendations or []
        
    def filter_by_month(self, month):
        """添加新功能作为单独的方法"""
        filtered_activities = [a for a in self.activities if a.date.month == month]
        return UserReport(
            self.user,
            activities=filtered_activities,
            # 可根据需要重新计算或保留原有数据
        )</code></pre>
<p><span data-type="text">新功能可以独立添加，不影响现有功能，同时也避免修改这种核心逻辑时测试不全面带来的上线提心吊胆。</span></p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<h2><span data-type="text">可测试性</span></h2>
<p><span data-type="text">良好的构造函数设计对代码的可测试性有着决定性的影响。当构造函数简单且只负责基本初始化时，测试变得更加容易、更加可靠，且不依赖于特定环境。这也是为什么我写本篇文章的原因，就是在写单元测试时发现很多类几乎不可测试（部分引用的第三方类库中的类，类本身属于其他组件，我无权修改，-.-）。</span></p>
<h3><span data-type="text">依赖注入与可测试性</span></h3>
<p><span data-type="text">如果构造函数有较多逻辑，例如：</span></p>
<pre class="highlighter-hljs"><code>class UserReport:
    def __init__(self, user_id):
        self.user_id = user_id
        self.user = database.fetch_user(user_id)
        self.activities = database.fetch_user_activities(user_id)
        self.statistics = self._calculate_statistics()</code></pre>
<p><span data-type="text">那么我们的单元测试会变的成本非常高昂，每一个外部依赖都需要mock，就算只需要测试一个非常简单的Case，也需要模拟所有外部依赖，比如</span></p>
<pre class="highlighter-hljs"><code>def test_user_report():
    # 需要大量的模拟设置
    with patch('module.database.fetch_user') as mock_fetch_user:
        with patch('module.database.fetch_user_activities') as mock_fetch_activities:
            # 配置模拟返回值
            mock_fetch_user.return_value = User(1, "Test User", "test@example.com")
            mock_fetch_activities.return_value = [
                Activity(1, datetime(2023, 1, 1), "login"),
                Activity(1, datetime(2023, 1, 2), "login")
            ]
            
            # 创建对象 - 即使只是测试一小部分功能也需要模拟所有依赖
            report = UserReport(1)
            
            # 验证结果
            assert report.statistics["login_count"] == 2
            assert report.statistics["active_days"] == 2
            
            # 验证调用
            mock_fetch_user.assert_called_once_with(1)
            mock_fetch_activities.assert_called_once_with(1)</code></pre>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<p><span data-type="text">而构造函数简单，我们的单元测试也会变得非常简单，比如针对下面代码进行测试：</span></p>
<pre class="highlighter-hljs"><code>class UserReport:
    def __init__(self, user, activities=None):
        self.user = user
        self.activities = activities or []
        self.statistics = {}
    
    def calculate_statistics(self):
        """计算统计数据"""
        login_count = len(self.activities)
        active_days = len(set(a.date for a in self.activities))
        self.statistics = {
            "login_count": login_count,
            "active_days": active_days
        }
        return self.statistics</code></pre>
<p><span data-type="text">可以看到单元测试不再需要复杂的Mock</span></p>
<pre class="highlighter-hljs"><code>def test_report_should_calculate_correct_statistics_when_activities_provided():
    # 直接创建测试对象，无需模拟外部依赖
    user = User(1, "Test User", "test@example.com")
    activities = [
        UserActivity(1, datetime(2023, 1, 1), "login"),
        UserActivity(1, datetime(2023, 1, 2), "login"),
        UserActivity(1, datetime(2023, 1, 2), "logout")  # 同一天的另一个活动
    ]
    
    # 创建对象非常简单
    report = UserReport(user, activities)
    
    # 测试特定方法
    stats = report.calculate_statistics()
    
    # 验证结果
    assert stats["login_count"] == 3
    assert stats["active_days"] == 2</code></pre>
<p><span data-type="text">同时测试时，Mock对象注入也变得非常简单，如下：</span></p>
<pre class="highlighter-hljs"><code>def test_report_should_use_activity_source_when_calculating_statistics():
    # 准备测试数据
    user = User(42, "Test User", "test@example.com")
    mock_activities = [
        UserActivity(42, datetime(2023, 1, 1), "login"),
        UserActivity(42, datetime(2023, 1, 2), "login")
    ]
    
    # 创建模拟数据源
    activity_source = MockActivity(mock_activities)
    
    # 使用依赖注入
    report = UserReport(user)
    report.calculate_statistics(activity_source)
    
    # 验证结果
    assert report.statistics["login_count"] == 2
    assert report.statistics["active_days"] == 2</code></pre>
<p><span data-type="text">而做边界值测试时更为简单：</span></p>
<pre class="highlighter-hljs"><code>def test_statistics_should_be_empty_when_activities_list_is_empty():
    user = User(1, "Test User", "test@example.com")
    report = UserReport(user, [])  # 空活动列表
    
    stats = report.calculate_statistics()
    assert stats["login_count"] == 0
    assert stats["active_days"] == 0

def test_constructor_should_throw_exception_when_user_is_null():
    # 测试无效用户情况
    with pytest.raises(ValueError):
        report = UserReport(None)  # 假设我们在构造函数中验证用户不为空</code></pre>
<p><span data-type="text">因此整个代码逻辑通过单元测试将变得更为健壮，而不是需要大量复杂的Mock，复杂的Mock会导致单元测试非常脆弱（也就是修改一点逻辑，导致现有的单元测试无效）</span></p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<h2><span data-type="text">架构相关影响</span></h2>
<h3><span data-type="text">更容易依赖注入</span></h3>
<p><span data-type="text">依赖注入的核心理念是高层模块不应该依赖于低层模块的实现细节，而应该依赖于抽象。好比我们需要打车去公司上班，我们只要打开滴滴输入目的地，我们更高层次的需求是从A到B，而具体的实现细节是打车过程是哪款车，或者司机是谁，这也不是我们关心的。具体由哪辆车，哪位司机提供服务可以随时切换。</span></p>
<p><span data-type="text">依赖注入是现代软件架构的核心实践之一，而简单的构造函数设计是实现有效依赖注入的基础。通过构造函数注入依赖，我们可以构建松耦合、高内聚的系统，显著提高代码的可维护性和可扩展性。</span></p>
<pre class="highlighter-hljs"><code># 直接在类内部创建依赖
class UserReport:
    def __init__(self, user_id):
        self.user_id = user_id
        # 直接依赖具体实现
        self.database = MySQLDatabase()
        self.user = self.database.fetch_user(user_id)</code></pre>
<pre class="highlighter-hljs"><code># 通过构造函数注入依赖
class UserReport:
    def __init__(self, user, activity_source):
        self.user = user
        self.activity_source = activity_source
        self.statistics = {}
    
    def calculate_statistics(self):
        activities = self.activity_source.get_activities(self.user.id)
        # 计算逻辑...</code></pre>
<p><span data-type="text">通过第二段代码可以看到更容易实现依赖注入，通常实际使用中还结合依赖注入容器（IoC）自动化依赖的创建和注入，但这超出本篇的篇幅了。</span></p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<h3>&nbsp;</h3>
<h3><span data-type="text">更容易暴露设计问题</span></h3>
<p><span data-type="text">构造函数仅做赋值操作，还能更容易得暴露类的设计问题。当构造函数变得臃肿或复杂时，这通常表明存在更深层次的设计缺陷。</span></p>
<p><span data-type="text">比如一个类的构造函数有大量参数时，通常意味着类承担过多的职责，比如：</span></p>
<pre class="highlighter-hljs"><code># 需要引起警觉：参数过多的构造函数
class UserReport:
    def __init__(self, user, activity_list, login_calculator, active_days_calculator, 
                visualization_tool, report_exporter, notification_system):
        self.user = user
        self.activity_list = activity_list
        self.login_calculator = login_calculator  
        self.active_days_calculator = active_days_calculator
        self.visualization_tool = visualization_tool
        self.report_exporter = report_exporter
        self.notification_system = notification_system
        self.statistics = {}</code></pre>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<p><span data-type="text">一个常见的解决思路是使用Builder模式，让初始化过程更加优雅，但这通常只能掩盖问题，而不是解决问题</span></p>
<p><span data-type="text">因此可以将过多参数的构造函数当做red flag，正确的解决办法是重新查看类的设计，进行职责分离：</span></p>
<pre class="highlighter-hljs"><code># 核心报告类，只关注数据和基本统计
class UserReport:
    def __init__(self, user, activities):
        self.user = user
        self.activities = activities
        self.statistics = {}
    
    def calculate(self, calculator):
        self.statistics = calculator.compute(self.activities)
        return self

# 分离的统计计算
class ActivityStatistics:
    def compute(self, activities):
        login_count = len([a for a in activities if a.action == 'login'])
        unique_days = len(set(a.date for a in activities))
        return {"logins": login_count, "active_days": unique_days}

# 分离的报告导出功能
class ReportExport:
    def to_pdf(self, report):
        # PDF导出逻辑
        pass
    
    def to_excel(self, report):
        # Excel导出逻辑
        pass

# 分离的通知功能
class ReportNotification:
    def send(self, report, recipients):
        # 发送通知逻辑
        pass</code></pre>
<p><span data-type="text">那么类的调用就会变得非常清晰：</span></p>
<pre class="highlighter-hljs"><code># 清晰的职责分离
user = User(42, "John Doe", "john@example.com")
activities = activity_database.get_user_activities(user.id)

# 创建和计算报告
calculator = ActivityStatistics()
report = UserReport(user, activities).calculate(calculator)

# 导出报告（如果需要）
if export_needed:
    exporter = ReportExport()
    pdf_file = exporter.to_pdf(report)

# 发送通知（如果需要）
if notify_admin:
    notifier = ReportNotification()
    notifier.send(report, ["admin@example.com"])</code></pre>
<p><span data-type="text">这种方式每个类都有明确的单一职责，构造函数简单明了，同时功能可以按需组合使用以及测试变得简单（可以单独测试每个组件）。</span></p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<h1><span data-type="text">特例</span></h1>
<p><span data-type="text">某些情况下，构造函数除了赋值，还可以做一些其他工作也是合理的，如下：</span></p>
<h2><span data-type="text">参数合法性检查</span></h2>
<p><span data-type="text">在构造函数中进行基本的参数验证是合理的，这确保对象从创建之初就处于有效状态，例如下面例子，只要构造函数不进行外部依赖操作或复杂的逻辑运算都是合理的</span></p>
<pre class="highlighter-hljs"><code>class User:
    def __init__(self, id, name, email):
        # 基本参数验证
        if id &lt;= 0:
            raise ValueError("User ID must be positive")
        if not name or not name.strip():
            raise ValueError("User name cannot be empty")
        if not email or "@" not in email:
            raise ValueError("Invalid email format")
        
        self.id = id
        self.name = name
        self.email = email</code></pre>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<h2><span data-type="text">简单的派生值计算</span></h2>
<p><span data-type="text">有时，在构造函数中计算一些简单的派生值是合理的，只要在整个类声明周期，计算后的值都不变：</span></p>
<pre class="highlighter-hljs"><code>class Rectangle:
    def __init__(self, width, height):
        if width &lt;= 0 or height &lt;= 0:
            raise ValueError("Dimensions must be positive")
        
        self.width = width
        self.height = height
        # 简单的派生值计算
        self.area = width * height
        self.perimeter = 2 * (width + height)</code></pre>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<h2><span data-type="text">不可变对象的初始化</span></h2>
<p><span data-type="text">对于不可变对象（创建后状态不能改变的对象），构造函数需要完成所有必要的初始化工作：</span></p>
<pre class="highlighter-hljs"><code>class ImmutablePoint:
    def __init__(self, x, y):
        self._x = x
        self._y = y
        # 预计算常用值
        self._distance_from_origin = (x**2 + y**2)**0.5
    
    @property
    def x(self):
        return self._x
    
    @property
    def y(self):
        return self._y
    
    @property
    def distance_from_origin(self):
        return self._distance_from_origin</code></pre>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<h1><span data-type="text">小结</span></h1>
<p><span data-type="text">一个设计合理的构造函数，是打造易维护、易测试、易扩展系统的基础。我们应始终坚持构造函数「仅做赋值和必要的基础验证」这一原则，使代码更为清晰和灵活。</span></p>
<p><span data-type="text">简单的构造函数能带来以下优势：</span></p>
<ul>
<li>
<div><span data-type="text">易于维护</span><span data-type="text">：职责单一、副作用少，便于后续的调试与迭代。</span></div>
</li>
<li>
<div><span data-type="text">易于测试</span><span data-type="text">：不依赖外部环境，能轻松实现模拟和单元测试。</span></div>
</li>
<li>
<div><span data-type="text">架构更清晰</span><span data-type="text">：便于实现依赖注入，更符合SOLID原则，也能更快地识别设计上的问题。</span></div>
</li>
</ul>
<p><span data-type="text">当我们发现构造函数开始复杂化，参数越来越多时，这通常是代码设计本身出现了问题，而不是一个能用Builder模式等技巧快速掩盖的问题。正确的做法是退一步重新审视类的职责，及时进行重构。</span></p>
<p><span data-type="text">当然，在实际编码过程中，有时候我们可能会做出一定程度的妥协，例如对参数进行基本合法性检查、简单的数据派生计算，或者初始化不可变对象。这些情况应该是少数的例外，而不是普遍的规则。</span></p>
<p><span data-type="text">总之，通过保持构造函数的简洁和直观，我们不仅能够写出高质量的代码，更能及早发现和解决潜在的设计问题，使整个系统更加稳固和易于维护。</span></p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
</article>
</div>
<div class="clear"></div>

            </div>
            <div class="postDesc">posted @

<a href="https://www.cnblogs.com/CareySon">CareySon</a>&nbsp;

</div>
